Settlement.name: {=Settlements.Settlement.name.town_isengard}Isengard
Settlement.text: {=Settlements.Settlement.text.town_isengard}The fortress of Isengard, domain of Saruman the White.

Settlement.name: {=Settlements.Settlement.name.town_dolguldur}Dol Guldur
Settlement.text: {=Settlements.Settlement.text.town_dolguldur}The Hill of Sorcery, stronghold of the Necromancer.

Settlement.name: {=Settlements.Settlement.name.town_lothlorien}Lothlorien
Settlement.text: {=Settlements.Settlement.text.town_lothlorien}The Golden Wood, realm of the Lord and Lady.

Settlement.name: {=Settlements.Settlement.name.town_gundabad}Gundabad
Settlement.text: {=Settlements.Settlement.text.town_gundabad}Mount Gundabad, the ancient orc stronghold in the Misty Mountains.

Settlement.name: {=Settlements.Settlement.name.town_mirkwood}Mirkwood
Settlement.text: {=Settlements.Settlement.text.town_mirkwood}The Woodland Realm of the Silvan Elves.

Settlement.name: {=Settlements.Settlement.name.town_erebor}Erebor
Settlement.text: {=Settlements.Settlement.text.town_erebor}The Lonely Mountain, the great Dwarven kingdom.

Settlement.name: {=Settlements.Settlement.name.town_rivendell}Rivendell
Settlement.text: {=Settlements.Settlement.text.town_rivendell}Imladris, the Last Homely House East of the Sea.

Settlement.name: {=Settlements.Settlement.name.town_umbar}Umbar
Settlement.text: {=Settlements.Settlement.text.town_umbar}The Haven of Umbar, stronghold of the Corsairs.
